changelog: Added bStats integration with ID 26487 for analytics
Added Paper and Folia support with compatibility layer
Added 80+ cosmetics across 7 categories (Particles, Hats, Pets, Trails, Gadgets, Wings, Auras)
Added comprehensive credit system with Vault integration
Added EssentialsX integration for backup economy support
Added LuckPerms integration for advanced permission management
Added auto-update system with manual override
Added fully configurable message system with hex color support
Added SQLite and MySQL database support with connection pooling
Added GUI system with pagination and category browsing
Added daily login bonuses and playtime rewards
Added performance optimizations for large servers
Added comprehensive admin commands and management tools
